official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit discrimination on account of age in credit card transactions.

summary.text: Amends the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit any credit card issuer from discriminating on the basis of age with respect to the issuance or terms of a credit card.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit discrimination on account of age in credit card transactions.
